entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
